name: The Sweet Treats Man! - Gameboy Analog Horror
name_original: The Sweet Treats Man! - Gameboy Analog Horror
description:
Can you survive through Halloween Eve? The Sweet-Treats Man will get you if you are not careful! Pulse-Pounding Paranoia screams in your heart as you're running to hide for your life and manage to collect the candies in order to proceed through the game. It's all fun and games until the jingle begins and he crawls near... Then, every step you make, with cold sweat clinging to your flesh, might be your last.

But, the horrifying truth is... that ONLY YOU can explore the secrets behind this banned cartridge and break its murderous curse! P̷̖̯̥͕̯͋ļ̵̹̮̗̣͉̈́̅̐͝e̵̡̬̹͌̂͒̍͛̇́͘a̴̮͉̦̲͔̮̔̔͠s̴̨̡̧̫̳̭̬̫̔͒͐̃é̸̫̾̍͆,̷̝̜̪̄̈́̅̓͂͗̏ ̸̫̻̦̒̓̽̀̂̽͑̔̍f̷̤͚̖̹̮͝͝į̸͇̺̼̯͂̾̀͗̑̀̒͜͝n̷͔͙̗̺̲͇̻̠̑d̵̢̍́̅̅͒͑̏͝ ̴̜̲̺̔̍̍̐̄͗͘ư̷̳̲̞̈́̈́́̌̎̚͝ș̴̨̜̲̤̗̉͐͗͐!̵̨̛̦̭̎̽̓̃͒͊́̽͜ ̶̧̮͔̤̩̄̓̾̓͆K̸̨̨̺͔̥̹̰̀̆ͅé̸͍̜̺̹͕͙̭̐̇͒̕ę̴̪͍̹͉̪͚̳̀͋̈́̾̌̿̉̅̂͜p̷̨̣̺̱̦̳͇̱̣̉̔̄̿̈́̀ ̴̧̛͙̻̲͌̍̀̂͠͝a̶̧̙̣͕̱̟͋̍̾̍̅̑̿͒̌͜͜ͅn̶̡̛̹̖͙͇͒̈̑͊͘͘ͅ ̷̙̄̓̋̀̚e̸̜̳̣̲͗̓͆́̆͠y̵̲̱̱͓̝̦̲̿̾e̵̙̫̯̩̜̲̓́͋͐͠͝ ̶̢̢͎̳͚̪̞̱̈́̓͑͊ͅo̶̢̨̟̒́͑̀̓̀̌̓̃u̷̡̇̿͋̏̓̆̅t̸̥͖͇̜͐̾̈́́ ̷͚̦̖̺̹͐̓́͜͠f̷̘̾ȯ̶̢̦̦̟̚͝ŕ̴͔͗̊̊̈́͒͝͝ ̵̛̮̭̻̤̞̖̠͖̑͊̅̓͘̚͝t̸̛̪̘͓͍͍̞͚̒͋̿̅͒̿̌h̷̬̱̘̻̖̺̘͖͙̍̽͆̊̌̃͘e̶̺̦͇̺̤̻̟̺͊͜ ̵̖͍̞͍̍͝H̴͕̹̗̥͙̑͠͝i̷̧̱͓͈̭̿̑̿͠d̸̩͔̻͔͋̈́͊̾̈́͋̌͘͠ḑ̷̧̡̡͚̥͈̻̻̉͌̏̈͐̓̆̚͝ę̸̮̝̜̫̳͕̮͕̾̈́̏̂͆̇͘͘̚ṉ̸̛͇́͒͐̂̃ ̴̱̹͍͝M̷͓̦̲̤͔̹̀͗̃̋̉̓̓̾ͅe̸̛̬̗̞̹̹͐̿͊̄̒̀̾̑s̴̫͔̻̘̉̚š̷̥͇͕̳̳̟͓̣͗̋̎͝a̷͉̣̒̀̑̋̚͠g̶͙̩̼̜̻͉̎͗͑͜͠ë̸͍̰͎͍̖̭̭̙́̄̒̐ͅs̷̻͕̥̆͒̈́͂͑!̶̀̄͛͐͐͊̔̚ O̵̥͕̹̟̍̊̓̋̾ư̴̡͇͋͐̂͂͐̚r̴͓̼͍̻̠͇̯͚̬̄́ ̴̲̐̐͠o̵̞̼̮̦̾̀n̵̦̫̠̱̂̌̾̚̕ḷ̸̢̭̹̫͙̪̎̓̈́͛̒͌̉ȳ̸̢̪̯͙͛̈́ ̵̡̢̣͈͕͉̲͕̥̀̋̈́̌̋h̴̡̲̱̥̤͍͉̲̆o̵͎̟̤̒͗̄̕ͅp̶͚͇̫̟̌͛́̂͋̄͠e̸̡̛̮͈͔̫͖̟͍͍̅̄̿̂̽̿̕ ̵̡̤̼̥̩̼̤͑̿i̶̩̹̫̝̼̪̝̇̈́̆͠s̸̱͔̩̮̻͊̓ͅͅ ̶̘͍̣̈́͝y̵̛͚̺͍̹͕͂͐̚o̸̯͉͑̄̓͐͋̐͂͘ŭ̴͓̬̭̝͉͍͍͎͑̓̕!̴̨̝͚̱͛͆ ̶̫͓̫͍̘̆̐̆̕͜Ś̶̡̧̧̫̙̗̝̖̣̅̓̄̿̉̋T̷̨͍̯̣̮͇̜̒O̷̢̧̡̭͍͉̮̅̍̏͒͝͠ͅP̴̜̑̓̽̏̕ ̶̛̗͚͚͈̦̭͐̍̿̆̌H̵̳͉̮͝Ī̶̮̽͒̿̅̌̓̔̊M̴̱̘̜̝͆̃̿̑̈́̚!̵̲̟̬̖̻̮̭̯́̓̀̌͆͘

Will you survive the Electronic Nightmare? FIND OUT TODAY!

-- DONATION REWARDS --

The Sweet Treats Man!  will be available for FREE until the end of the GBJAM 10's voting period. You can pre-order any copy of the game and support it, by donating. 

Here are the available rewards: 

3$ - PRE-ORDER Mobile Edition Key (Android / iOS)

(Includes the Mobile Port of the Game and a Digital Copy of the Original Soundtrack)

6$ - PRE-ORDER PC Edition Key (Windows)

(Includes the Upcoming PC Version of the Game and a Digital Copy of the Original Soundtrack)

10$ - PRE-ORDER Collector's Edition Bundle (Digital/Physical)

         (Includes Keys for both upcoming Versions + a  Decoration Gameboy Box Cover of  the Game + Instruction Manual and Guide to achieve both endings + 1 Random PaperCraft Minifigure of any character you want from the game + Making The Sweet Treats Man e-book)

(IMPORTANT : After making a donation, make sure to send a message to this e-mail (stathistsasakosdev@gmail.com), in order to receive your reward shortly after its release )
